\begin{abstract}
This is a sample paper used for testing the LaTeX compilation script.
It includes basic elements like citations, figures, and tables.
\end{abstract}

\section{Introduction}

This is a test document. We cite some work here~\cite{example2024paper}.

\section{Method}

Our method involves the following equation:
\begin{equation}
    y = mx + b
\end{equation}

\section{Results}

See Table~\ref{tab:results} for our main results.

\begin{table}[h]
\centering
\caption{Main results}
\label{tab:results}
\begin{tabular}{lcc}
\toprule
Method & Accuracy & Time \\
\midrule
Baseline & 0.75 & 10s \\
Ours & 0.85 & 12s \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\end{table}

\section{Conclusion}

This concludes our test paper.
